attributes.action: Add option to vote "None of the above" in all UK elections.
attributes.additional_details: The NOTA option is widely used in other democracies and should have already been put to public consultation in the UK, according to a 2015 Parliamentary Committee that the Govt ignored and abolished.
attributes.background:
The only way to indicate if we find no candidate acceptable is to vote for a fringe or comedy option (eg. Lord Buckethead, the Monster Raving Loony Party, UKIP) or to not vote at all. Neither really makes the voter's intention clear, though.

A vote for "None of the above" solves this problem.
